frame.name: Rising_to_a_challenge
frame.definition:
<def-root> A <fen>Protagonist</fen>, by exerting great effort, comes to meet the pre-conditions for participating in an <fen>Activity</fen> that is judged to be difficult for them to participate in, either due to their inherent properties or due to temporary <fen>Circumstances</fen>.
<ex>In conclusion, <fex name="pro">our staff</fex> <t>rose</t> <fex name="act">to the challenge</fex> <fex name="mea">in developing the necessary training programs and delivery methods</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="pro">Dr Runcie</fex> <t>rose</t> <t>to</t> <t>the</t> <t>occasion</t> <fex name="mea">with a simple address</fex>. <fex name="act">DNI</fex></ex>
<ex>There was still clearly much to do, but <fex name="pro">the governor and his staff</fex> had begun to <t>rise</t> <fex name="act">to the task</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Pacers say <fex name="pro">they</fex>'ll <t>rise</t> <fex name="act">to the pressure</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> who is exerting effort to meet the pre-conditions for participating in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>How <fex name="pro">a small hospital</fex> <t>rose</t> to the challenge of a legionella outbreak.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> expends efforts towards.
<ex>She <t>rose</t> <t>to</t> <t>the</t> <t>occasion</t> <fex name="act">of bringing up her children single-handed even as a woman who was not educated except a few years in Primary school</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> exceeds or falls short of the minimum requirements for participating in the <fen>Activity</fen> as a result of expending effort to get themselves ready.
<ex>I'm used to second books not living up the promise of the first, but Nero Blanc <fex name="deg">fully</fex> <t>rose</t> to the challenge.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> exerts effort to meet the pre-conditions necessary for engaging in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex> I recalled how she <t>rose</t> <t>to</t> <t>the</t> <t>occasion</t> <fex name="cir">in mishaps, avalanches, oxygen shortage, lack of food, loss of comrades</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>An entity, event, or state of affairs that causes the <fen>Protagonist</fen> to expend the effort necessary to meet the pre-conditions for participating in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>The installation was anything but a routine project from the beginning and everyone involved <t>rose</t> to the challenge <fex name="Explanation">because it was gratifying to be contributing in some way to the tsunami relief effort</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relevant_feature
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characteristic or behavior of the <fen>Protagonist</fen> that is considered when judging whether the <fen>Protagonist</fen> might participate in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>You are able to adapt quickly to important shifts in the world around you, and <t>rise</t> to the challenge <fex name="rel">where career is concerned</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action performed by the <fen>Protagonist</fen> which enables them to overcome the difficulties and engage in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Learn how one small shop <t>rose</t> to the challenge <fex name="mea">through the use of gift tables</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> through expenditure of effort becomes capable of engaging in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>A president for whom the jury was still out for many Americans first appeared shaken, but <fex name="tim">then</fex> <t>rose</t> to the</ex> crisis.
</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> expends effort to become capable of engaging in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Students from a number of Metropolitan schools <t>rose</t> to the challenge <fex name="pla">at DMIT's Panorama Campus</fex> on Friday 22nd August and spent the day participating in an annual 'Taste of Engineering' activity.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably</ment>, <ment>presumably</ment>, <ment>mysteriously</ment>), general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Protagonist</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>eagerly</ment>).
<ex>Despite all odds the brave Macedonian people heroically <t>rose</t> to the task <fex name="man">with valour</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rise.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: respond admirably to (a challenging situation).

lexUnit.name: rise to the occasion.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: respond admirably to a difficult situation
